nodes.text: The Rasaaran storage facility was a facility used by many criminals as a base of operations. The smuggler Tyrodall had an operation inside the facility of smuggling Tarisian relics to Imperials.

The Rasaaran storage facility appears in a mission for the Jedi Knight class on Taris in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011. A dark side option presented by Watcher One to the player, the mission has the Jedi raid the storage facility in order to recover Jedi artifacts that the Death's Claw were selling to a Sith. The facility also appears in a Smuggler mission; the text for the Jedi Knight mission misspells the facility's name as Raarsan.
